channel.title: ++Rep
channel.description: Ok, there are some people that haven't even done nothing useful but seem to still get rep ; is their any other ways to get rep other helping out .. do you get rep for being active and posting ?

item.title: ++Rep
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:16, topic:318860”][quote author=reverce link=topic=415319.msg3057883#msg3057883 date=1260640008]
Half of the 200 rep++ are idiots , the other half are mopar geniuses in every community had good and bad sides …
[/quote]
I had about 600 rep before they caped it at 200.[/quote]
yes but you aren’t an idiot u even got graphics master…

Read full topic

item.title: ++Rep
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:318860”][quote author=Owner_Of_GdogScape link=topic=415319.msg3056488#msg3056488 date=1260503238]

There is no criteria to obtain rep. It is useless around here.
[/quote]It shows that you are helpful & know things lol.

Not on this forum, it did at one point have meaning. Then everyone just gave it out like crazy for stupid reasons.[/quote]
Blame m,i,k,e and the crew.

Read full topic

item.title: ++Rep
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

[quote=“Owner_Of_GdogScape, post:3, topic:318860”][quote author=Newty link=topic=415319.msg3056486#msg3056486 date=1260503139]
There is no criteria to obtain rep. It is useless around here.
[/quote]It shows that you are helpful & know things lol.[/quote]
How can you base somebody’s knowledge on a number given by other users?
There are plenty of people with high reputation that are quite frankly idiots.
Same applies for being helpful; all I see is majority of them having a chip on their shoulder pretending they’re somewhat intelligent when they’re not, and they just put people down.

Read full topic

item.title: ++Rep
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Members at moparscape have no judgment whatsoever. It’s used loosely and handed out ever so often. I’m not saying that reputation that is given out is always in vein, but more likely than not, it is. All in all: maxing your reputation isn’t an accomplishment, as anyone can easily obtain such status.

Read full topic
